name: Over-The-Counter (OTC) derivatives 10% currency depreciation carrying amount
description: Over-The-Counter (OTC) derivatives 10% currency depreciation carrying amount in Scenario B is a simulation of a 10% depreciation in each currency in which the institution has aggregate Over-The-Counter (OTC) derivative liabilities amounting to or exceeding 5% of the institutionâ€™s total liabilities.
